divs: Sighting Details1. camping in the woods 2. it was a fleet of ufos they were bright 3. i dont know a hot air balloon race. 4. it flew in a line a fleet of ships of all different shapes 5. i blacked out right after it from drinking too much whisky, it helps me with my nerves, however, during i was screaming and hiding in the bushes. 6.
